subtitle: Noctua means 'owl'—a home for artists and learners.
welcome_message: Welcome to my Forest! I'm Noctua, your guide to discovering the hidden patterns in your words.
explore_forest_desc: Uncover the hidden patterns in your favorite songs and poems with data-rich analysis.
learn_create_desc: Understand complex rhyme schemes and create your own poetic masterpieces.
share_connect_desc: Export your findings and share your lyrical journeys in the Forest with the community.
noctua_observatory_welcome: Welcome to my Observatory! Ready to unlock the music in your words?
noctua_forest_welcome: Welcome to my Forest! Here you can discover fellow creators and explore the community that calls this place home.
want_to_connect: Want to connect or claim this profile?
sign_up_to_join: Sign Up to Join Noctua Forest
observatory_subtitle: Analyze your text for phonetic patterns and rhymes. Each analysis costs tokens based on text length.
wait_tooltip: To prevent abuse, please wait before your next analysis.
